Blog.post: huahmm...udah malem, tugas belom juga beres...deadline hari selasa & rabu, kenapa jadi males begini..pikiran udah kusut, ngerjain tugas dari kemaren sampe sekarang belom beres...itung2 tidur baru 3jam doang...kenapa tugas belom selesai juga??..tadi gw sempet maen yahoo messenger sebentar, eh ngobrol ama cewek (ngakunya sih fotomodel dari surabaya) ya biasa lah kita ngobrol2..dan tiba2 dia curhat, salah satu pertanyaan yg masih gw inget : "gimana rasanya kalo sedang jatuh cinta?" nah lho?!..sebagai laki2 tulen sempat ge-er, tapi cool dulu trus kita lanjutin.......dan akhirnya ternyata dia lagi dilema (katanya) sama pacarnya...huhmmm...kenapa mesti tanya2?!...mungkin itulah cewek ya...makhluk yang butuh pengertian dari cowok.......ada benernya kalimat : pria itu berasal dari MARS dan wanita itu berasal dari VENUS.......huahhmmm ngantuk berat!!!!....
Baru aja visit webforum di plasa.com, eh ada sesuatu yang menarik...newcomer -> GodFather

THE REBORN OF STONECOLD.. banyak kejadian2 aneh yang sebenernya gak bikin happy tapi banyak banget kasi pelajaran dalam hidup...cinta, kesedihan, keindahan adalah hal yang biasa kita temui..tapi ketika kita menemukan arti hidup adalah sesuatu yang luar biasa...
ahh...akhirnya...siang ini gw ujian...bahannya lumayan banyak tapi gw baru baca paper2 gw doang belom baca buku2nya...moga2 sukses deh..

ahhmmm...gw lagi bete abis...gw cuman dapet poin "B"..brengsek..yang laennya bisa dapet "A" kenapa gw dapet "B"??..aduh emang mungkin kemampuan otak gw cuman segitu kali..tetep aja bete..!@#@!?@??!?#..brengsek abis..ah tau ah!!! jadi males ngapa-ngapain..

hmm...kenyang..buka puasa makan iga sapi bakar..ya mirip2 ama konro bakar hehe..alhamdulillah..malem ini ngerjain tugas (lagi)..dikumpulin hari Kamis malem ama temen gw nana..tapi hari Kamis gw ujian...siap2 mengarang bebas...tergantung konsep pemahaman kita aja...udah ah..yang penting kita belajar dan berusaha...

haha..banyak kejadian lucu & norak hari ini...tadi pagi ke kantor Uni Eropa, kantornya di lantai 16 Wisma Dharmala Bhakti..and wow...fasilitas perpustakaannya lengkap abis!..@!#?!#?!..dan yang paling penting, koleksi buku2nya bikin tangan jadi 'gatel'...pengen gw ambil..pengen gw bawa pulang...dan ternyata bukan cuman gw aja yang punya pikiran begitu..hehe..trus banyak souvenir yang disediakan pihak Uni Eropa, mulai dari CD-ROM Interactive, Mouse Pad, Brosur, Katalog, NoteBook dll..banyak banget...semuanya diberikan secara cuma2...nah..gw kesana bareng temen2 gw, so mulailah penjarahan terjadi...inilah yang gw bilang kejadian lucu & norak...lucunya, anak2 ternyata udah siap dengan tas kosong..haha..dan noraknya, bener2 kayak orang gak ada sopan santun..ngambil souvenir kayak rebutan sembako...aduh...malu...apa kata orang Eropa kalo ngeliat kejadian hari ini ya? haha...

huahhmm...malam menuju bulan Ramadhan, nanti pagi sahur dan mulai puasa..hmm gak kerasa cepet banget udah puasa lagi..tugas kajian ekonomi gw udah selesai akhirnya dan besok pagi gw harus ke kantor perwakilan Uni Eropa buat tanggung jawab gw..terus sorenya gw balik aja kerumah, browsing2 cari mobil buat gw beli terus...kerjain tugas lagi...ampunn deh...ngantuk..besok banyak yang harus dikerjain...tidur ah..

hujan udah selesai..dan sekarang hawa panas yang dateng..heran makin hari makin panas, apa udah mau kiamat ya?!..oke, lagi2 tugas..udah 80% selesai dan tugas satunya gw kebagian mengkaji mengenai sejarah jerman..weleh..gak pernah ke jerman tapi dapet tugas begini?!....@!#*!?!#@.... udah ah! gw mau cuci mobil dulu, hujan udah berhenti...cuci lagi..cuci lagi....

akhirnya selesai urusan bengkel, gw ganti ama tape yg harganya 200rb hehe...sayang soalnya kalo mobil gw jual dengan audio + cd changer dll..abis dari bengkel tadi rencananya mau cuci mobil, eh hujan deres banget ya udah balik aja langsung kerumah and mobil dibiarin kena air hujan dulu...hehe baru dicuci...cuaca begini enak buat tidur & males2an..tapi tugas masih nunggu buat diberesin, nanti pagi sahur..puasa lagi akhirnya..oke deh, gw mau ngerjain tugas lagi..

tugas belom beres juga..kayaknya mesti refreshing dulu, jalan2 kemana kek..tapi pagi ini gw mesti kebengkel mau bongkar audio system mobil gw, soalnya mobil gw tu mau gw jual..pengen cari ganti yang tahunnya lebih muda plus transmisinya automatic jadi gak pegel kalo nyetir dijakarta begini..hmm asik juga pagi2 gini dengerin lagunya John Mayer "Bigger Than My Body"...udah gw cabut dulu kebengkel audio...
whew...akhirna..forumbuzz bisa online sampe tahun depan..trus tahun depannya lagi???

You were wrong You were right And you are gone Tonight You were free So alive You were wrong You were right And you were down You could see And you wore hearts for me And you were sharp Sharp as knives You were wrong You were right Shot down said you never had the chance Took a ride on a suicide romance Could have sworn there was somebody home To facilitate the great unknown Oh woman, I ain't going to meet you anywhere Dont know where Im going yet, But I sure am getting there Shotgun fire anybody home I got two dimes in the telephone Alright? No, It's not easy tonight Shotgun fire anybody home I got two dimes in the telephone Alright? No, It's not easy tonight She's In over my head And it's not easy, it's not easy tonight She's In over my head And it's not easy, its not easy tonight Shotgun fire anybody home I got two dimes in the telephone Alright? I'm Dying, Dying to wake up without you, without you in my head again I'm Dying, Dying to forget about you, that you ever lived There's a shade come over this heart that's coping with laying down to rest I'm Dying to live without you again I'm Dying, Dying to find a distraction, get you away from me I'm Dying, Dying to reach a conclusion, so that the world can see It's the same old story of love and glory that broke before it bent I'm Dying to live without you again The first time you left I said goodbye Now there's not a prayer that can survive Dying, Dying to die just to come back so we can meet again Dying, Dying to say what I always should have said It's a strange emotion this but there's still hope in this As long as there's a breath... I'm Dying and I can't live without you again It's a strange emotion this but there's still hope in this As long as there's a breath... I'm Dying and I can't live without you I'm Dying and I can't live without you again whew..itulah kenapa suse mendefinisikan what is LOVE?

malem ini gw fit banget haha..tadi OL sebentar ketemu PAPA JOSII trus backup database eh PAPA JOSII marah2 soalnya Forum gw disable 10 menit haha rasain, padahal dia lagi bikin FAQ, Tips & Triks segala macem deh... sorri Jod.. so malem ini gw keluar jalan2, meskipun sendirian tapi gw udah punya tempat tujuan hahahaha....

sore2..duduk diteras rumah, smoking dan baca2 koran PC Plus yg barusan gw beli isinya bahas tentang VGA Card, ya siapa lagi kalo bukan ATi Vs Nvidia..weh bosen itu2 mulu..mau keluar lagi2 ujan..mau browsing internet, masih LAG..ya udah..bengong lebe enak kayaknya...

shits...koneksi ISP dari subuh sampe sore masih gak bener,akhirnya proses backup gw undur lagi meski ada rasa cemas tapi harus optimis moga2 ntar malem koneksi internet udah jalan lagi. dari kemaren sampe hari ini kerjaan gw masih seputar itu2 juga kecuali akhir bulan ini rejeki dateng..yep gw dapet project bareng temen2 gw di jogja, menggarap sebuah event hajatannya suatu produk rokok yg terkenal.. ya moga2 aja bisa berlanjut

horray..akhirnya gw jalan2 dan berhasil untuk maen bowling, yg lebih penting lagi gw memecahkan rekor skor gw sendiri feel so good brother... belom pernah gw sampe 145 okelah, itu kepuasan gw..dan untungnya lagi hujan baru turun ketika gw masuk rumah, weh..enak nih buat bobo, sambil visit ke forumbuzz duluw ngeliat perkembangan jumlah member dan kenapa ya gak nambah-nambah??
uhui...abis cuci mobil (lagi)..dan cuaca sedang bagus-bagusnya dan akhirnya gw hari ini bisa keluar rumah untuk melampiaskan dendam untuk jalan-jalan...aduh kasian deh gw

grr...ujan lagi...ujan lagi...gagal lagi..gagal lagi, rencananya hari ini pengen keluar cuci mobil and jalan2..ehh ujan, deres lagi..eh bener,temen gw sms dia bilang "...udah lu beruntung dari tadi dirumah,jalanan macet gue udah 2jam stuck di pejompongan.." dalem hati gw.."..emang enak kena macet?!" ... huahhmmmm..gila,hampir seminggu gw gagal mulu keluar rumah gila,jangan2 besok kalo keluar rumah udah lupa jalan lagi....oh my god!!!!

jam segini...gak ada kerjaan..mau maen bowling eh, hujan deres banget jadi males keluar, hiks...oh forumbuzz..kenapa masih sepi aja tuh forum?? kurang promosi kali ye, hmm harus lewat apa nih promosinya...

ngantuks booooo........................fbuzz ku sayang fbuzz ku malang....weh, gw tadi malem ada pengalaman seruuu abisss..makanya gak bisa update, gw dan temen gw iseng2 bertandang ke tempat bude temen gw itu dan ternyata waktu kita mampir kesana wuihh...lagi ada atraksi supranatural budenya bisa berdiriin keris boo..dan goyang2, satu yg gw sesalkan gw gak bawa kamera untuk kasi liat bukti otentiknya...whoaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
huahmmm...ngantuk..nungguin backup database forumbuzz gak kelar2..bingung..apa koneksi internet gw yg gak beres?? LINKNET emang betein..

hari sabtu, yg kata kebanyakan orang hari istirahat dan refreshing -- yg sayangnya untuk hari ini kata orang itu gak berlaku buat gw..lebih banyak kerjaan daripada refreshing, hari ini adalah hari ke-3 dan the final day to edit the paperwork etc..etc.. but it's okay lah...yg penting gw hari sabtu gak manyun2 amat, ada kerjaan.. besok Stipen Pu, akad nikah dan gw gak bisa dateng..kerjaan bledugs man!, gw cuman kirim doa aja supaya hubungan mereka tetap awet sampe kakek / nenek, jadi keluarga yg sakinah dan bakal punya anak yg saleh... selamat ya stip!!!

setelah berminggu-minggu untuk bikin shoutbox..akhirnya berhasil..yep, lumayanlah dapet html code dari creez ituh... malem ini gw masih utak-atik masalah proyek bareng temen gw dan yah udah 85% jadi deh..tinggal survey terakhir dan estimasi dibagian ini dan itu, uhuii....so nothing much i do from morning until midnight except take care this project... ci vediamo domani tutti..

I found the pieces in my hand They were always there It just took some time to understand You gave me words I just can't say So if nothing else I'll hold on while you drift away Cause everything you wanted me to hide Is everything that makes me feel alive Cities grow Rivers flow Where you are, I'll never know But I'm still here If you were right and I was wrong Why are you the one that's gone I'm still here Still here Seeing the ashes in my heart The smile the widest When I cry inside and my insides blow apart I tried to wear another face Just to make you proud Just to make you put me in my place But everything you wanted to take from me Is everything that I could never be Cities grow Rivers flow Where you are, I'll never know But I'm still here If you were right and I was wrong Why are you the one that's gone I'm still here Maybe tonight It's gonna be alright I will get better Maybe today It's gonna be okay I will remember I held the pieces of my soul I was shattered and I wanted you to come and make me whole When I saw you yesterday But you didn't noticed And you just walked away Cause everything you wanted me to hide Is everything that makes me feel alive Cities grow Rivers flow Where you are, I'll never know But I'm still here If you were right and I was wrong Why are you the one who's gone And I'm still here The lights go out, the bridges burn Once you're gone, you can't return I'm still here Remember how you use to say I'd be the one to runaway But I'm still here

inilah meja kerja gw ... yah, sedikit berantakan dan gelap, tapi dari sinilah mulai dari kerjaan, tugas dan iseng2 berawal ... bikin-bikin source code buat forumbuzz, kirim email, bikin proposal, bikin tugas dan ehmm..ehmm.. nonton film dongsss... -- malem ini baru aja dirumah gw ada pengajian jadi baru selesai beres2 langsung tancap internet dan bikin blog untuk hari ini, yep..ada yg kurang kalo belom update blog dan nothing special hari ini cuman acara tadi itu aja..so good night!!!!

wadowww.... mulai dari sore tadi tenggorokan sakit .. padahal rokok udah berangsur-angsur kurang ..yah dalam rangka untuk berhenti merokok moga2 aja bisa bener2 berhenti, yah itung2 udah jalan 2bulan rokok cuman beli satu bungkus doang..sampe sekarang masih ada sisa 4 batang uhuiiii.... hew...mungkin dari beberapa posting blog gw kemaren terkesan grumpy..yah, gak sengaja aja gw keinget ama mantan gw.. damn i loved her so much... we only lasted in 1 year relationship, she can't do a long distance relationship dan yeah..gw juga harus mikirin masa depan gw, gak mungkin selamanya gw harus dijogja mulu ... that's a sacrifice..a really bad sacrifice... yah if only we can make it better...

I think I've already lost you I think you're already gone I think I'm finally scared now You think I'm weak - but I think you're wrong I think you're already leaving Feels like your hand is on the door I thought this place was an empire But now I'm relaxed - I can't be sure I think you're so mean - I think we should try I think I could need - this in my life I think I'm scared - I think too much I know this is wrong it's a problem I'm dealing If you're gone - maybe it's time to come home There's an awful lot of breathing room But I can hardly move If you're gone - baby you need to come home, come home Cuz there's a little bit of something me In everything in you I bet you're hard to get over I bet the wound just won't shut I bet my hands I can stay here I bet you need - more than you mind I think you're so mean - I think we should try I think I could need - this in my life I think I'm just scared - that I know too much I can't relate and that's a problem I'm feeling If you're gone - maybe it's time to COME home There's an awful lot of breathing room But I can hardly move If you're gone - baby you need to come home, come home Cuz there's a little bit of something me In everything in you I think you're so mean - I think we should try I think I could need - this in my life and I think I'm scared - do I talk too much I know this is wrong it's a problem I'm dealing If you're gone - maybe it's time to come home There's an awful lot of breathing room But I can hardly move If you're gone - baby you need to come home Cuz there's a little bit of something me In everything in you why i lost you...

You left me with goodbye and open arms A cut so deep I don't deserve You were always invincible in my eyes the only thing against us now is time Could it be any harder to say goodbye and without you, Could it be any harder to watch you go, to face what's true If I only had one more day I lie down and blind myself with laughter A quick hope is what I'm needing And how I wish that I could turn back the hours But I know I just don't have the power I'd jump at the chance We'd drink and we'd dance And I'd listen close to your every word, As if its your last, I know its your last, Cause today, oh, you're gone. Like sand on my feet The smell of sweet perfume You stick to me forever and I wish you didn't go, I wish you didn't go away To touch you again, With life in your hands. It couldn't be any harder.. harder.. harder why the words GOODBYE exist in this life.....

baru aja ditelpon ama temen gw yg dijogja dan akhirnya proyek deal yep... setidaknya ada nih buat nambel tabungan yg semakin menipis....terimakasih TUHAN.... uhui!!! sekarang tinggal ngetik project rundown, script dan sedikit utak-atik masalah proposal via email ke temen gw ...tapi buntu boy..kaga ada ide...busseetttttttt

Is it love tonight When everyone's dreaming Of a better life In this world Divided by fear We've gotta believe that There's a reason we're here There's a reason we're here 'Cause these are the days worth livin' These are the years we're given And these are the moments These are the times Let's make the best out of our lives See the truth all around Our faith can be broken And our hands can be bound But open our hearts and fill up the emptyness With nothing to stop us Is it not worth the risk? Is it not worth the risk? 'Cause these are the days worth livin' These are the years we're given And these are the moments These are the times Let's make the best out of our lives Even if hope was shattered I know it wouldn't matter 'Cause these are the moments These are the times Let's make the best out of our lives We can't go wrong Thinking it's wrong To speak our minds I've gotta let out what's inside Is it love tonight When everyone's dreaming But can we get it right? Yeah but can we get it right? 'Cause these are the days worth livin' These are the years we're given And these are the moments These are the times Let's make the best out of our lives Even if hope was SHATTERED I know it wouldn't matter These are the moments These are the times Let's make the best out of our lives again...something for the soul of mine..

selamat pagi, badan pegel capek,lesu,letih. Semalem tidur jam 4 pagi, yeah..biasa gak ada kerjaan dirumah akhirnya ngelayap.. yep, ngelayap ke tempat2 yg ada live musicnya dan gak sengaja ktemu temen2 SMA haha..udah deh jadinya makin jadi.. lemes euy.. bobo lagi ahhh...

pussinggg...lemes,capek..hari ini kerjaan udah jalan 3 hari, tinggal nunggu hari-h..tiap malem meeting teyus ampe jutek, dasar temen gw emang hobi ngomong ntu anak paling seneng kalo meeting.. "yok..ntar sore meeting lagi!" ; gw bilang, " lha? bukannya tadi malem udah?" .. "weiss..jangan males.." eh gitu doang dia jawabnya..alamak..ini malem aja lagi bikin agenda buat meeting dan gw nyuri2 pake komputer hihihi... yah..yang penting target gw udah tercapai -- so cuman setor muka doang ntar malem, dan asiknya lagi UHUII!!!! ntar malem calon2 SPG pada dateng... aduhh...banyak bidadari wangi-wangi...UHUII!!!!

whew..cuman dapet sela waktu 15menit, akhirnya gw pake untuk nge-blog ajah..gile udah 3hari kaga update blog -- kerjaan udah semakin menggunung dan intensitas stress udah mule naik.. oke deh -- ciao tutti! ci vediamo prossimo giorno!
